      adds listener to calculation button and catches exceptions thrown by ConversionModel class
      void calculateByParameters(java.util.List<java.lang.String> args)
      checks the command line arguments and sets the default ones if needed and in the end fires the calculation button if string doesnt match anything in enum then select default
      ConversionView getView()
      getter for view
      void initializeListFromFile()
      initializes list from file and catches exceptions thrown by model(IOexception and ParseException) also creates new file if needed

        public void calculateByParameters(java.util.List<java.lang.String> args)
